name: Sectan
description:
Description and lore:

Sectan is short adventure 2D game which main goal is to escape from the sect who is trying to sacrifice you in the name of Satan.

You are one of many prisoners from a group of sectarians, followers of Satan. The prison cells are getting emptier as the sectarians take away the prisoners one by one, never to be seen again. One day, you hear an unusual loud scream, followed by an earthquake that breaks out part of your cell, allowing you to escape. Now, you have to fight your way out with your bare hands, clashing against the sectarians, and even Satan itself, who’s been recently summoned after many human sacrifices.
